title: Heyui67
author: Heyui67
content: Which r best slots for bonus huntWhich r best slots for bonus huntI do 150 spinsRecommend slots on nolimit gamomat

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on June 23, 2023, 12:20:34 PMWhich r best slots for bonus huntWhich r best slots for bonus huntI do 150 spinsRecommend slots on nolimit gamomatI wonder why people keep playing slots where they have to chase it by using a lot of spins,usually the provider which gives you the bonus round in less than 200 spins on average is Play n Go.In No Limit City you can buy directly the bonus and no need to get tired by chasing it which does not guarantee you of any success of achieving it,Gamomat is an old provider not that popular nowadays,we have Pragmatic Play,No Limit Ciy,Play n Go and Relax Gaming as the most well known slot providers.Nowadays most casinos offer a list of buy in bonus round slots so you should play there as it costs like x100 your bet to get the bonus,meaning no need to spin 100 spins as you don't know if you will get it or not rather use the buy in feature.

comments.author: mu_enrico
comments.body: Do you mean getting a bonus round with only 150 spins?That would be tough since 150 spins are pretty low and the bonus round is randomly triggered. Sometimes you'll get no bonus rounds even after 500 spins.However, I'd suggest you search for medium-volatility, reasonable max-win, and multiple feature rounds games. A game like Tomb of Nefertiti (Nolimit) I think strikes all the requirements. It would be pretty unlucky if you get no:- Wild Raider- Curse of Nefertiti, or- Raider (Free) Spins; after 150 spins.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on June 23, 2023, 12:20:34 PMWhich r best slots for bonus huntWhich r best slots for bonus huntI do 150 spinsRecommend slots on nolimit gamomatYou know you can choose from a lot here on the forum, there are duelbits, Fortune Jack, Livecasino, Rollbit, and others, it's impossible for you not to get a free spin there in my opinion. Oh, so do a search on Google search.I only gamble once in a while, so I don't focus on how many free spins there are, as long as I have something to play in slot games, I'm fine with that, as long as I'm having fun playing gambling and that's what's important to me as a player.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: If you have some money to invest, I suggest playing a slot that includes a bonus buy feature. You avoid all the unnecessary spinning and searching for scatters by doing it that way. Online slots are completely based on luck and the RNG determines if and when you will win. There is no certainly you will be successful after 150 or 150.000 spins. On the other hand, you can also get lucky and trigger the bonus rounds after the first spin. No one knows.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Heyui67 on June 23, 2023, 12:20:34 PMWhich r best slots for bonus huntWhich r best slots for bonus huntI do 150 spinsRecommend slots on nolimit gamomatPush gaming ang Relax Gaming offers maximum high multiplier which typical slot provider doesn’t have. Their RTP’s is also high that is very good for bonus hunt since you will surely consume a lot of spin if you will hunt a bonus.I’m only doubtful about 150 spins for bonus hunt though. Most likely you will need low volatility slot games in able to achieve a bonus with just small amount of spin. Try Play’n Go and Pragmatic if you want to stick with that low spin count.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Almost all slots can spawn bonus round if you are lucky.  I have read people sharing their bonus spawn spins within 50 to 150 tries in different slots.  While other never get it on the same game.  I still think it is a random chance since sometimes I experience less than 50 spin to trigger bonus round of slots game while sometimes the bonus does not spawn even with 500 spins.  I often play  Hacksaw, NoLimit City, Play'n Go, Bgaming, ELK, Avatar UX and Push gaming .

comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 23, 2023, 02:09:12 PMQuote from: Heyui67 on June 23, 2023, 12:20:34 PMWhich r best slots for bonus huntWhich r best slots for bonus huntI do 150 spinsRecommend slots on nolimit gamomatYou know you can choose from a lot here on the forum, there are duelbits, Fortune Jack, Livecasino, Rollbit, and others, it's impossible for you not to get a free spin there in my opinion. Oh, so do a search on Google search.I only gamble once in a while, so I don't focus on how many free spins there are, as long as I have something to play in slot games, I'm fine with that, as long as I'm having fun playing gambling and that's what's important to me as a player.With his current spin amount allocated on his bonus hunt, I think the cahnce of getting free spin is very slow besides he should be looking for a nice game provider instead of the casino since they are just offering same slot games while OP needs a low volatility game to make this hunt possible to achieve.150 spin is very low count to get a free spin on normal slot game but it’s possible on low volatility slot games that gives small return even with bonus round. I usually get free spin frequently on AvatarUX slot games but the return is very low if the bonus is hit using few spin.

comments.author: Casdinyard
comments.body: Play N Go slots as swogerino say, gives you a bonus round at least after every 200 spins. It’s 50 short from what you normally do but honestly speaking dude if you’re hoping for a bonus round after a measly 150 spin yiu might as well ask for a goose that lays golden eggs cause that’s a much easier to achieve task than what you’re looking for. I myself spend as much as 500 spins every game without a consistent bonus round so what less would your chances be if you’d just stick with spending 150 spins. As far as I know this game provider’s the most generous out of every slot creator out there cause most of them are completely randomized (even play n go but I’m positive they had some pity system in there that makes it easier to get a bonus round compared to other games in here but whatever.)

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: It's funny that all people care about is bonuses, free spins, so if a new casino appears that offers games with lots of free spins and lots of bonuses, people will immediately create an account at the casino, they won't worry about things like casino security, reputation, whether or not it has kyc, what is the minimum withdrawal amount and what is the amount charged in the withdrawal fee, people will not worry about that, all they will be chasing is the bonus, but because of this greedy thinking and that scammers have been very successful in creating scam casinosscammers know that all they need is just to create a casino and they offer many bonuses that with that they will be able to deceive and rob many people. because people just don't get it into their heads that gambling is for fun and that with that they just play in old and reliable casinos, and forget about the high bonuses, high free spin and focus on playing where they won't be cheated and robbed. I hope they are not focused on the high bonuses and focus on the reputation of the casinos, old and reliable casinos tend not to offer high bonuses and high free spins. but they are reliable casinos and that's what matters most
